openjsip.proxy

Class TransactionsMapping

  • java.lang.Object
    • openjsip.proxy.TransactionsMapping

  • public class TransactionsMapping
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a class that maps ServerTransactions to one or more ClientTransactions

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      Set of ClientTransactions

      SipProvider

    • Constructor Detail

      • TransactionsMapping

        public TransactionsMapping(ServerTransaction serverTransaction,
                   SipProvider sipProvider)
        Constructs a new transactions mapping class
        Parameters:
        serverTransaction - ServerTransaction object for wich this class will hold associated ClientTransactions
        sipProvider - SipProvider object wich received request and with wich serverTransaction is associated.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - If serverTransaction is null

    • Method Detail

      • getServerTransaction

        public ServerTransaction getServerTransaction()

      • getClientTransactions

        public java.util.HashSet getClientTransactions()
        Returns:
        Client transactions associated with server transactions. If none, the empty set is returned (but not null).

      • getClientTransactionsArray

        public ClientTransaction[] getClientTransactionsArray()
        Returns:
        Client transactions associated with server transactions. If none, zero-length array is returned (but not null).

      • getSipProvider

        public SipProvider getSipProvider()

        public void removeMapping(ClientTransaction clientTransaction)

      • registerTimerC

        public void registerTimerC(java.util.Timer timer,
                  ClientTransaction clientTransaction)
        Register TimerC for the clientTransaction. TimerC is used to terminate clientTransaction when the final response is absent for a long time.
        Parameters:
        timer - Timer object
        clientTransaction - Client transaction which timer will cancel.

      • cancelTimerC

        public void cancelTimerC(ClientTransaction clientTransaction)
        Cancels and removes TimerC to ClientTransaction association.
        Parameters:
        clientTransaction - Client transaction object for which to cancel TimerC.

        public ResponseContext getResponseContext()
